uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet

Class PasswordChangeRequestServlet<A extends AppUser>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.WebappServlet
          • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.PasswordChangeRequestServlet<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - type of AppUser
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="PasswordChangeRequestServlet",
            urlPatterns="/PasswordChangeRequestServlet/*")
public class PasswordChangeRequestServlet<A extends AppUser>
extends WebappServlet
    Servlet to handle web password resets. If a PasswordChangeRequestFactory.PasswordChangeRequest matching the servlet-path is found (and is valid) the user is prompted for a new password. If this is a legal password then the password is changed and the user is logged in.
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
